name: GLASSHOUSE
description:
My first game! Made it during my second and third semester at Hochschule Hannnover. You play as a little plant crab trying to escape a botanical garden.

Learned a lot while making it! Also means there's lot of bugs and it might not be all that intuitive to play. The camera jumps around a lot, I used Cinemachine, but wasn't really sure how to use it. I had lots of fun making the shader, models and animations though! Hope you still enjoy!

Music is by Kevin Macleod (of course), SFX from HSH Sound Library. Assets, Textures, Code and Shader made by me, based on tutorials and of course what I learned at Uni.
